drug.name: Pegamotecan
drug.description: Pegamotecan has been used in trials studying the treatment of Cancer of Stomach, Sarcoma, Soft Tissue, and Gastroesophageal Cancer.

category.category: Compounds used in a research, industrial, or household setting

drug-interaction.name: Peginterferon alfa-2a
drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Pegamotecan can be decreased when used in combination with Peginterferon alfa-2a.
